definition: rating (for power output, flame resistance etc)
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: In such a case the arrester rating could be substantially lower .
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況，避雷器額定值可明顯低些。

sentences.english: The electric motor should not overload, three -phase current should be balance.
sentences.chinese: 電動機的負載電流不得超過額定值，三相電流平衡。

sentences.english: The voltage rating of these resistors must be at least equal to the test voltage.
sentences.chinese: 這些電阻器的電壓額定值必須至少等於測試電壓。
